name: Allspace
description: 100 pilots battle with lasers, plasma, and missiles in free to play Allspace.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4 GHz or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K 3.7 GHz or equivalent Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
